name: Package Patrick
description:
Package Patrick is simple puzzle game where you must guide the Control-Tek 9000 to package crates. While a crate is in the Control-Tek 9000 it can not be affected by gravity, but the moment it leaves, is the moment the box will fall. Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours.  I am aware of the many glitches and lack of levels. IMPORTANT - If you are playing with a standard 16:9 monitor, please click on the blue fullscreen button. Otherwise click on the grayed out fullscreen button.

Programming and Art - BenBonk

https://www.youtube.com/BenBonk

Music - GizmoDude8128

https://gizmodude8128.bandcamp.com/
